title: It's Too Bad Revive Has a Longer CD Than Flash
body:
I could see some really funny uses for it.

* Karthus, as he already can use it-- the only one
* Mundo. Ult, two lives. Revive, three lives. Ult, four lives. 
* Nasus. You cannot stop a god. -Ever-.
* Katarina/Yi. Reset city, they die, come back, reset city again.
* Good job you caught the Blue Ez, now do it again
* Zilean with enough CDR becomes straight-up r%%%%%ed
* Kayle can now ult 2-3 times in a fight instead of 1-2

... And now I understand why Riot won't make Revive viable.

It'd still be fun though.
